name: Dungeon Hoard
description:
In a magical dungeon coins are appearing out of thin air! Collect as many coins as you can, but watch out for those who wish to do the same.

Collect the coins that are appearing and return them to your treasure chest. These coins are heavy and you can only carry one at a time!

Fight off the gobs who are trying to steal the coins from your chest. The more coins you have the more gobs will come!
